game.name: Jinx  Minx Tower Escape
game.description:
The two skeleton bunnies named Jinx and Minx have got trapped in a spooky tower. They are seeking for someone who could help them escape from their prisons. Do you think that you have the guts to complete this task in the shortest possible time? Join Jinx and Minx’s Tower Escape game and get a chance to reunite two bunnies by making a successful escape! Remember keys are uncovered and shackles are unlocked. 

In this brand new adventure game, you will have to sort out the puzzle to keep your game going. Use the mouse to collect objects, left and right mouse button to move and up key to enter door sneak through the tower’s dark corridors. Make sure to solve the puzzles to find the keys for these two lovely bunnies. These keys will help you to unlock doors and spot the two bunnies who want to come out of the prison at any cost. 

You will meet with zombie animals and many other dangerous obstacles during the gameplay. Different floors and different corridors to explore in this free online escaping game for boys! Use patience and apply your mind to sort out the puzzle and make it easier for you to unlock the doors from where the two bunnies can leave the tower for their home. Enjoy more adventure games for boys at our free online game website and have a lot of fun with ease!
